title: Quick question about the PBE sign up
body: I was selected to make a PBE account and so today I went to make an account. I put in my username and password but _''Something went wrong''_ after I clicked Finish Registering. What should I do?

replies.body:
Hey StarGuardianSona (as a Sona player, I would not be against this skin happening...),

Were you able to log in to the PBE/PBE boards once you made your account? If not, you may need to go back and try to create your account again, as the registration may not have completed due to the error you received.

Riot Chesties – Last Thursday at 3:37 AM
Summoners, we are aware of a PBE sign-up issue and are currently working on a fix.
When did you apply? I applied back in February and i'm  still waiting {{item:3070}}
I applied for pbe sometime early last year
